name: Lines and Patterns (Painting Composition)
description: `Lines and Patterns (Painting Composition)` is part of `Seamless Realities` body of work that describes my painting practice. My paintings are sketches for a reality that is disembodied while virtual works become material, in a continuous roleplay between the tangible and the virtual that come to influence one another. Repetitive forms become content: patterns are remodeled into new compositions aiming to find deviations from a serial order by reshaping the initial structure from regular and predictable to asymmetrical and non-repetitive. 2021 | @c_e_braileanu
